Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
BTO_Management_System.Enquiry
public class Enquiry extends Object
Represents an enquiry submitted by an applicant regarding a specific BTO project. It stores the unique enquiry ID, the applicant who submitted it, the project it pertains to, the text of the enquiry, and any reply provided by an officer.

    Constructs a new Enquiry object with the specified applicant, project, and enquiry text.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(Applicant applicant, BTOProject project, String enquiryText)
      Constructs a new Enquiry object with the specified applicant, project, and enquiry text. A unique enquiry ID is automatically generated.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant submitting the enquiry.
      project - The BTO project the enquiry is about.
      enquiryText - The text content of the enquiry.

  • Method Details

    • getEnquiryId

      public int getEnquiryId()
      Returns the unique identifier of this enquiry.
      Returns:
      The enquiry ID.

    • getProject

      public BTOProject getProject()
      Returns the BTO project that this enquiry is about.
      Returns:
      The BTO project.

    • getApplicant

      public Applicant getApplicant()
      Returns the applicant who submitted this enquiry.
      Returns:
      The applicant.

    • getEnquiryText

      public String getEnquiryText()
      Returns the text content of the enquiry.
      Returns:
      The enquiry text.

    • getEnquiryDetails

      public String getEnquiryDetails()
      Returns a formatted string containing the details of the enquiry, including the enquiry ID, applicant's name, project name, and the enquiry text.
      Returns:
      A string representing the enquiry details.

    • updateEnquiry

      public void updateEnquiry(String newText)
      Updates the text content of the enquiry.
      Parameters:
      newText - The new text for the enquiry.

    • getReplyText

      public String getReplyText()
      Returns the reply text provided by an HDB officer, if any.
      Returns:
      The reply text, or null if no reply has been provided.

    • setReplyText

      public void setReplyText(String replyText)
      Sets the reply text for this enquiry, typically provided by an HDB officer.
      Parameters:
      replyText - The reply text to set.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Overrides the equals method to compare Enquiry objects based on their unique enquiry ID.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to compare with.
      Returns:
      true if the objects have the same enquiry ID, false otherwise.
